name: Pong (itch) (Arpan Neupane)
description:
This is the original pong game. The game is played the same way you would play ping pong. You and the computer will be playing against each other. There are 2 paddles and 1 ball. The paddle on the right is yours and the paddle on the left is the computer's. You will try to hit the ball with the paddle and the computer will try to bounce it back and if it fails to bounce back then you get a point, vice-versa.

Input:

Up arrow: Paddle moves up

Down arrow: Paddle moves down

HAVE FUN PLAYING!!!
